title: How can one prepare for the TSPSC Group 3? What books should be referred? - Quora

response.answer_text: TSPSC- Group-III Paper-I General Studies & General Abilities Top 15 Model papersVijeta Competition Editorial Board Rs.99 2. Telangana Udyamala Charitra – Rashtra AvirbhavamEnglish Medium V Prakash Rs.330 TSPSC Group-III Paper-I General Studies and General AbilityTelugu Medium Vijeta Competitions Editorial Board Rs.485 TSPSC Group-III Paper-II Section-I Social-Cultural History of India and Telangana Bit Bank 9500 BitsTelugu Medium Vijeta Competitions Editorial Board Rs.139 TSPSC Group-3 Paper-III Economy and DevelopmentTelugu Medium T Pratignya Rs.399 If you get online coaching for TSPSC group 3, it would be way more effective than reading books because their approach is quite progressive.

Find TSPSC Group III syllabus here TSPSC Group 3 Notification 2018 - Syllabus, Exam Pattern tspsc.gov.in Start reading all the topics on the internet. Make notes. Once confident with this initial reading, go to any library and find suitable books there with the help of Liberian
